name: tancld

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(ctan, c0), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (tan ` c0)∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℂ, (cos ` c0)≠ 0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ctan, c0), cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0)), wcel(cfv(ctan, c0), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ctan, c0), cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0)), wcel(cfv(ctan, c0), cc))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0)), wcel(cfv(ctan, c0), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ctan, c0), cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0))

comment: Closure of the tangent function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
